outcome: Technocratic Purists activate a contingency for enhanced surveillance, tightening control.

events.description: Technocratic Purists implement enhanced surveillance, claiming stabilization needs amidst heightened tensions.
Businesses and citizens report increased monitoring and restrictions, sparking quiet dissent.
Factions clash within the Council over the legitimacy of using Halden's contingency protocols.
Surveillance measures stir public protests, activists mobilize online and in-person to resist tightening control.
